I Can't Find The IMAGE Files In Windows XP
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Laboratory: Technical Research On The Monster Rancher CD Read Process: FAQ (Read This Section Before Posting Anything In The Laboratory): Troubleshooting CloneCD: I Can't Find The IMAGE Files In Windows XP
Winodws XP has changed where you will find the Image files for CloneCD. In all versions before XP, the files were located in C:\ Windows\ Temp. XP has a different filing system so...

The new path is found by going through Windows Explorer to: My Computer > Local Disk > Documents and Settings > "your username" > Local Settings > Temp.

"Your username" means the username you are signed on to the computer.

Hope this helps - John Hawley
